titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 720) to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize appropriations for State water pollution control revolving funds, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-36, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in part A of the report of the Committee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 23.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 229.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 179 (Roll no. 132).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/9/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 720 (Water Quality Financing Act of 2007).
